Title: China’s LNG imports rebound in May despite weak spot demand
Description: LNG imports into China recovered slightly in May, after four consecutive months of decline due to elevated spot LNG prices and weakened demand as a result of Covid-19 restrictions in parts of the country.
Author: CK

Title: Gazprom will stop gas supplies to Denmark’s Orsted today
Description: Danish energy firm Orsted said its gas supplies from Russia’s state-owned Gazprom will stop today because it has refused to comply with Gazprom’s requirements for gas supplies to be paid in rubles instead of in euros.
Author: CK
